Package nl.naturalis.nda.domain

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent  
    BioStratigraphy  
    ChronoStratigraphy  
    DefaultClassification
    A DefaultClassification classifies a specimen or species according to the ranks explicitly listed in the Darwin Core specification plus two extra higher ranks commonly used within the Naturalis specimen registration systems: super family and tribe.
    DistributionLocality  
    Expert
    An Expert represents a person or organization who is regarded as an authority with respect to a particular species.
    GatheringEvent  
    GatheringSiteCoordinates  
    GeoPoint  
    GeoShape  
    Iptc4xmpExt  
    LithoStratigraphy  
    Monomial
    A Monomial represents a node in a taxon hierarchy.
    MultiMediaContentIdentification  
    MultiMediaGatheringEvent  
    MultiMediaObject  
    NdaDomainObject
    The base class for all other classes within this package.
    NdaTraceableObject
    The base class for all domain objects within the NDA API that can be traced back to a single record in one of the NDA's source systems.
    Organization  
    Person  
    Reference
    A Reference represents a literature reference or common name.
    ScientificName
    This class encapsulates a taxon's full scientific name and the components it is composed of.
    ServiceAccessPoint  
    SourceSystem  
    Specimen  
    SpecimenIdentification  
    SpecimenMultiMediaObject  
    Synonym  
    Taxon  
    TaxonDescription  
    TaxonMultiMediaObject  
    TaxonomicIdentification  
    VernacularName

    ObjectType
    An enumeration of the three main domain objects within the NBA: specimens, taxa and multimedia objects.
